title: MMS Rating "Strong Sell" at the Macarthur Minerals Website
content: "Macarthur Minerals Ltd is an exploration and development company. It is focused on identifying and developing high-grade lithium, as well as countercyclical investments with significant lithium exploration interests in Australia and Nevada. In addition, the group has two Iron Ore projects in Western Australia; the Ularring hematite project and the Moonshine magnetite project. Geographically, it operates through the region of Australia."
